summary: Bitcoin Price and Ethereum Print Bullish Pattern, UNI Surges
title: Bitcoin Price and Ethereum Print Bullish Pattern, UNI Surges
content: Bitcoin price started a steady increase above the $19,500 resistance. BTC is currently (11:00 UTC) up over 5%, and there was a move above $20,000. The previous resistance at $19,500 might now act as strong support.

Similarly, most major altcoins are slowly moving higher. ETH is up 5% and is approaching the $1,400 resistance zone. XRP is attempting a move above the $0.48 resistance. ADA is consolidating above the $0.45 pivot level.

After a clear move above the $19,500 resistance zone, bitcoin price started a steady increase. BTC was able to clear the $19,800 and $20,000 resistance levels. The price settled above the $20,000 level and the 50-hour simple moving average. It is now consolidating near the $20,250 resistance. On the upside, the price is facing resistance near the $20,400 level. The next major resistance is near $20,500, above which the price might climb higher towards the $21,200 level.
On the downside, initial support is near the $20,100 level. There is also minor support near the $19,950 zone, below which the price could test the key support at $19,500.

Ethereum price also gained strength above the $1,350 resistance zone. ETH is up over 5% and trading well above the 50-day simple moving average. The price is now consolidating near the $1,380 level and preparing for a move higher. Immediate resistance is near the $1,410 level, followed by $1,450 level and $1,500, which is a round, psychological barrier.
On the downside, initial support is near the $1,370 level. The next support is at $1,345, followed by major support at $1,300.
Cardano (ADA) was able to climb above the $0.45 resistance zone. It is now consolidating and may target. a move above the $0.465 resistance zone in the near term.
Binance Coin (BNB is consolidating below the $285 resistance. If there is an upside break above the $285 level, the price might rise steadily towards the $295 level.
Solana (SOL) is attempting an upside break above the $35 resistance zone. If the bulls succeed, the price may perhaps rise towards the $36.50 and $36.80 levels.
DOGE is trading in a range above the $0.0620 level. Immediate resistance is near the $0.0632 level, above which it could rise towards the $0.065 level.
XRP price is rising again and climbing higher towards the $0.48 resistance. If there is an upside break, the price may revisit the $0.50 resistance.
Many altcoins are moving higher, including UNI, NEO, GMT, MKR, LDO, KSM, LEO, AAVE, LINK, MIOTA, XMR, CRV, and CVX. Out of these, UNI rallied over 15% and broke the $6.50 level.
Overall, bitcoin price is showing positive signs above the $20,000 level. If BTC climbs above $20,500, there may be a move higher towards the $21,200 level.
